title: Why are such racist things on youtube with millions of views and yet no one is talking about it?
comments: Only racist when non-Indians do it. Otherwise, it is a "beautiful story üòçü•∞ heart touching can't wait for more". Clown people.
üòÇüòÇ these are AI generated stories with comments by bot farm accounts. Ignore them.

These stories are a reflection of the society in which the poor live. They are not trying to be racist.

light_cleaned_title: Why are such racist things on youtube with millions of views and yet no one is talking about it?
light_cleaned_selftext: ​ [source :youtube, link:https:\/\/youtu.be\/4Ma\_DQyOvHI](https://preview.redd.it/d90anci74j6b1.png?width=1113&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=c93d6a03fae75510ea2ded62fd204d7d77d2913a) ​ This is the worst portrayal of how filthy and such racist content is lurking on youtube under such triggering names. Worst of all they show their moral of the story at end and you all might know what their moral will be. Not even a single soul till this date ever mentioned or took action against such open racist content being shown on this channel and not just one part but the amount of response made them to make multiple parts of this video. Just the thought of watching through the lens of those li'l kid who are acting here even if they have done make up or not breaks my heart. And what do we as a society do ,let's see some comments: ​ [source :youtube](https://preview.redd.it/3ymywgpn5j6b1.png?width=787&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=b9da466863661c49d5abe9f8b77815884bfcf034) ​ How does any kind of moral these videos have justify the hatred they are showing through out the video. Please report the videos atleast. I hope you can go through even a minute of these videos they are so painful to even watch few seconds.
